lead_paragraph: The governor of Rio said he asked Brazil’s Defense Ministry to maintain about 2,000 troops until next October in two slum areas that were cleared of drug traffickers by the police and the military.
snippet: The governor of Rio said he asked Brazil’s Defense Ministry to maintain about 2,000 troops until next October in two slum areas that were cleared of drug traffickers by the police and the military.

headline.main: Brazil: Extended Troop Presence Sought for Rio Slums
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Extended Troop Presence Sought for Rio Slums
